v-model:height.description: The display height of the current panel

anchors.description: Set a custom anchor point, in px
anchors.description_zh: 设置自定义锚点, 单位 px

duration.description: Animation duration, in ms, is set to 0 to disable animation
duration.description_zh: 动画时长，单位ms，设置为 0 可以禁用动画

contentDraggable.description: Allows dragging, dragging and dropping of content containers

safeAreaInsetBottom.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safeAreaInsetBottom.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

showScrollbar.description: Whether to turn on the scroll bar

events.name: heightChange
events.description: Triggered when the panel display height changes and the drag ends
events.description_zh: 面板显示高度改变且结束拖动后触发
